# Introdução


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
```
:::


## Scatter Plot



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = mtcars, aes(x = mpg, y = wt)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(
    x = "MPG",
    y = "Weight",
    title = "Scatter Plot",
    subtitle = "MPG vs Weight",
    caption = "Data: Motor Trend Magazine (1974) | EKIO Analytics"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 12)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=768}
:::
:::




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = mtcars, aes(x = mpg, y = wt)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=768}
:::
:::
